DataElement.preferredName: Follow-up Care From Stroke Specialist Physician Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The yes/no response related to the follow-up care provided by stroke specialist.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Follow-up Care From Stroke Specialist Physician
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Follow-up care provided by stroke specialist.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed.:The work of attending to someone or something.

Concepts.definition: The process by which information about the health status of an individual is obtained after a study has officially closed; an activity that continues something that has already begun or that repeats something that has already been done.
The work of attending to someone or something.

Property.preferredDefinition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point.:A disorder characterized by a sudden loss of sensory function due to an intracranial vascular event.:A physician who receives additional education and training in one particular area of medicine.

Concepts.definition: Used to indicate a specified place or time as a starting point; used to indicate a source, cause, agent, or instrument.
A disorder characterized by a sudden loss of sensory function due to an intracranial vascular event.
A physician who receives additional education and training in one particular area of medicine

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.origin: NINDS:National Institute of Neurological Disorders and Stroke Common Data Element Project
DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 5/25/18 - smt CDE transferred to NCIP ownership per NINDS (Muniza Sheikh) request.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
